testcase.name: info('plain text') should forward message and info level
info('plain text') should add _logger='main' meta data
info('plain text', {name: 'hugo'}) should add _logger='main' meta data
info('plain text', [true]) should add _logger='main' meta data and set true as '_' member
error('plain text') should log error level
warn('plain text') should log warn level
debug('plain text') should log debug level
trace('plain text') should log trace level
trace('', meta) should log meta data with _logger
empty locale should result in 'en' language
null locale should log an error and result in 'en' language
